# arctic-monthly-internal

This repository holds code relevant to Gale et al., 2026 (to be submitted).

## Setup Instructions

## Notebooks

`download_era5.ipynb`: This notebook copies the PI script from the Climate Data Store to download ERA5 surface data.

`Make_Figures.ipynb`: This notebook contains all of the code used to make figures and supplementary in the manuscript.
